Package teacher

Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
fromUser.User
fromEmployee.Employee
teacher.Teacher
All Implemented Interfaces:
fromUser.UserInterface, Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<fromUser.User>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dean, Rector
public class Teacher extends fromEmployee.Employee
The Teacher class represents a teacher in the educational system with various functionalities.
